org.apache.hadoop.hbase

接口 Tag

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ArrayBackedTag, ByteBufferTag

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="Coprocesssor")
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface Tag
    Tags are part of cells and helps to add metadata about them. Metadata could be ACLs, visibility labels, etc.

    Each Tag is having a type (one byte) and value part. The max value length for a Tag is 65533.

    See TagType for reserved tag types.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      Custom tags if created are suggested to be above this range.
      static int INFRASTRUCTURE_SIZE 
      static int MAX_TAG_LENGTH

        常量字段值

      • CUSTOM_TAG_TYPE_RANGE

        static final byte CUSTOM_TAG_TYPE_RANGE
        Custom tags if created are suggested to be above this range. So that it does not overlap with internal tag types
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • getType

        byte getType()
        返回:
        the tag type

      • getValueOffset

        int getValueOffset()
        返回:
        Offset of tag value within the backed buffer

      • getValueLength

        int getValueLength()
        返回:
        Length of tag value within the backed buffer

      • hasArray

        boolean hasArray()
        Tells whether or not this Tag is backed by a byte array.
        返回:
        true when this Tag is backed by byte array

      • getValueArray

        byte[] getValueArray()
        返回:
        The array containing the value bytes.
        抛出:
        UnsupportedOperationException - when hasArray() return false. Use getValueByteBuffer() in such situation

      • getValueByteBuffer

        ByteBuffer getValueByteBuffer()
        返回:
        The ByteBuffer containing the value bytes.

      • cloneValue

        static byte[] cloneValue(Tag tag)
        Returns tag value in a new byte array. Primarily for use client-side. If server-side, use getValueArray() with appropriate getValueOffset() and getValueLength() instead to save on allocations.
        参数:
        tag - The Tag whose value to be returned
        返回:
        tag value in a new byte array.

      • getValueAsString

        static String getValueAsString(Tag tag)
        Converts the value bytes of the given tag into a String value
        参数:
        tag - The Tag
        返回:
        value as String

      • matchingValue

        static boolean matchingValue(Tag t1,
                             Tag t2)
        Matches the value part of given tags
        参数:
        t1 - Tag to match the value
        t2 - Tag to match the value
        返回:
        True if values of both tags are same.

      • copyValueTo

        static void copyValueTo(Tag tag,
                        byte[] out,
                        int offset)
        Copies the tag's value bytes to the given byte array
        参数:
        tag - The Tag
        out - The byte array where to copy the Tag value.
        offset - The offset within 'out' array where to copy the Tag value.

      • getValueAsLong

        static long getValueAsLong(Tag tag)
        Converts the value bytes of the given tag into a long value
        参数:
        tag - The Tag
        返回:
        value as long

      • getValueAsByte

        static byte getValueAsByte(Tag tag)
        Converts the value bytes of the given tag into a byte value
        参数:
        tag - The Tag
        返回:
        value as byte
